title: Prague
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
It breaks my heart
To leave you far behind
It breaks me up
To leave so suddenly
Knowing we might never
Meet again
It hurts so much
To lose another friend
I could hope you're just as sad
To see me go
[Verse 2]
But I'd hate to be the cause
Of grief to someone I like so
Knowing we might never
Meet again
It hurts so much
To lose another friend
[Outro]
It breaks my heart
It breaks my heart
It breaks my heart
It breaks my heart
It breaks my heart
It breaks my heart to leave you far behind
To leave
